thread.title: Lil Wayne Embarking On 3 Tours This Year
thread.title_full: Lil Wayne Embarking On 3 Tours This Year

author: Trent Clark
title: Lil Wayne Embarking On 3 Tours This Year
text:
3 
Los Angeles, CA – No Carter V ? No problem. 
Lil Wayne is proclaiming not only does he have new music on the way but he’ll be globetrotting for much of 2017 with the recent announcement of three tours. 
The Young Money boss revealed the Kloser 2U, Kampus Krash and World Wide Weezy would keep him gainfully employed this year. A post shared by Lil Wayne (@liltunechi) on Mar 3, 2017 at 3:25pm PST 
As for the “new music,” Wayne is expected to release the full-length projects in Velvet , Funeral , Dedication 6 , and the aforementioned Carter V all this year. 
The Kloser 2U Tour already has its tickets on Live Nation’s website and the dates can be found below. 
April 14 – Louisville, KY – Louisville Palace April 15 – Madison, WI – Orpheum Theater April 19 – Anaheim, CA – House Of Blues April 20 – San Diego, CA – CCCU Open Air Theatre April 21 – Hollywood, CA – Hollywood Palladium April 27 – Oklahoma City, OK –The Criterion April 28 – Dallas, TX – South Side Ballroom April 30 – Houston, TX – Revention Music Center May 2 – Nashville, TN – Revention Music Center May 8 – Atlanta, GA – Coca-Cola Roxy Theatre May 10 – Grand Rapids, MI – Monroe Live May 11 – Detroit, MI – Fox Theatre Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You!
